The pure class interface. 
public class NameDecl
  extends AnnotatedTerm
A NameDecl is an annotated term which aggregates a Name. In the abstract syntax of ZIRP, it appears at places where a name is introduced.

Version: $Id: NameDecl.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:17 wg Exp $

public case NameDecl(Name name);

public Name name;
